hint:
Active: Chop Tree Destroy a target tree. 

Cast Range: 350
Passive: Quell  Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 8 for melee heroes, and 4 for ranged.
quelling_blade.notes: Effects of multiple quelling blades do not stack.
quelling_blade.lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

hint:
Use: Plant Tree Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

Range: 400
branches.lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

circlet.lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

ring_of_regen.lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

sobi_mask.lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

hint: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

Active: Energy Charge Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.

 Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.
magic_stick.notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
magic_stick.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

hint:
Active: Energy Charge Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. 

Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.
magic_wand.notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
magic_wand.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

hint:
Use: Replenish Grants 6 mana regeneration to the target for 25 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: 250
clarity.lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

hint:
Use: Salve Grants 30 health regeneration to the target for 13 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Heals for half the amount when cast on an ally.

Range: 250
flask.lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

hint:
Use: Plant Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a 1600 radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

Range: 500
ward_observer.lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

hint:
Use: Plant Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a 900 radius.
Lasts 7 minutes.

Does not grant ground vision.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero. Range: 500
ward_sentry.lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

hint:
Use: Devour Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with 3 charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: 165
tango.lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

hint:
Use: Disguise Turns the caster and all allied player-controlled units in a 1200 radius invisible, and grants 15% bonus movement speed for 35 seconds. 

Attacking or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility. 

Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.
smoke_of_deceit.lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

hint:
Use: Eat Mango Instantly restores 100 mana.

Range: 400
enchanted_mango.notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
enchanted_mango.lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

hint:
Use: Plant Plant the currently active ward.  Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.

Range: 500
ward_dispenser.notes: Hold Control to give one ward to an allied hero.
ward_dispenser.lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.

hint: Use: Imbue Instantly restores 85 health.
faerie_fire.lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

hint: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
wind_lace.lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.

hint: Use: Throw Grenade Throw a grenade at the target area. Enemies in the area will take 50 damage on impact, and be slowed by -15% and take 15 damage every 1s for 5 seconds. Radius 300.

energy_booster.lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

pers.lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

hint:
Active: Replenish Mana Restores 175 mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: 1200
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
arcane_boots.notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.
arcane_boots.lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

hint: Passive: Break Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 40 for 13 seconds.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
tranquil_boots.lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

hint:
Active: Meteor Hammer CHANNELED - After a successful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a 400 AoE, stunning enemies for 0.5 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemies units and buildings for 6 seconds. Non-building units are also slowed for 20% for the duration of the burn. 

Building Impact Damage: 95 
Building Over Time Damage: 60 

Non-Building Impact Damage: 150 
Non-Building Over Time Damage: 60 

Channel Duration: 2 seconds.
Landing Time: 0.5 seconds.

Active: Blink Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. 

Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
blink.notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
blink.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

hint:
Active: Force Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. 

Range: 550
force_staff.notes:
Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
force_staff.lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

hint: Passive: Aethereal Focus Increases targeted spell and item cast range.
aether_lens.lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

hint:
Active: Glimmer After a 0.5 second delay, grants invisibility, 40 movement speed and a magic damage barrier that absorbs up to 300 damage to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds. 

Range: 600

Can be cast while channeling.
glimmer_cape.lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

hint: Passive: Empower Spell The next Unit Target spell you cast on an enemy deals a separate 125 bonus damage to the target, and slows them by 50% for 1.2s.
Passive: Ability Upgrade Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
ultimate_scepter.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

hint:
Active: Avatar Applies a basic dispel. Grants 50% Magic resistance and immunity to pure and reflected damage. For the duration of the effect, any negative effect from enemy spells has no effect. 

Duration: 9 
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
black_king_bar.notes:
Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Abilities that pierce magic immunity will work fully even when Avatar is activated
black_king_bar.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

hint: Passive: Cooldown Reduction Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items.
octarine_core.lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

hint:
Active: Endurance Gives +50 attack speed and +15% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds. For the first 1.5 seconds allies are immune to slows.

 Radius: 1200

Passive: Swiftness Aura Grants 20 movement speed to allies.  

Radius: 1200
boots_of_bearing.lore: Resplendent footwear fashioned for the ancient herald that first dared spread the glory of Stonehall beyond the original borders of its nascent claim.
